Global prayer Sunday, 2-2-2026. Your name or X link is in the post.
@SenTomCotton @FBIDirectorKash Senator Cotton: The FBI allowed drug smuggling into the United Stated and into Canada.

@SenTomCotton @FBIDirectorKash Sen Cotton, Arkansas has the 4th highest violent crime rate of the 50 states, and Little Rock is one of only 3 major cities where the murder rate increased last year. Why on earth did you use a visit from the head of the FBI to talk about Communist China?
@SenTomCotton @FBIDirectorKash I don't see china on the Epstein list. Where's the arrests and the rest of the files? Cut the china and Russia boogie man propaganda bs.
